activity.title: coronasafe/care_fe#5991
activity.text: I can place the Loader inside the "root" div, which would afterwards be overwritten by the loaded React.

activity.title: coronasafe/care_fe#5991
activity.text: Ok I think I got what you are saying, so basically, I just have to configure a Loader in index.html, which would be same as the Loading component. Am I right?

activity.title: coronasafe/care_fe#5991
activity.text: And to do the same, I might need to disable the effect of "Suspense", am I allowed to do so?

activity.title: coronasafe/care_fe#5991
activity.text: I had a doubt, since we have used "Suspense" from 'react' in App.tsx, which configures the loading screen, so why we have have to integrate it in the index.html.

activity.title: coronasafe/care_fe#5991
activity.text: But I have been working for this issue for some days and reading the code of the repo as well.

activity.title: coronasafe/care_fe#5991
activity.text: Hello @rithviknishad, extremely sorry for being inactive for so many days due to some unavoidable circumstances.
